body.Subject: List of Secrets and Certificates near expiration

Compose_2.inputs:
Hello @{body('Get_Secret_Owner')?['value'][0]?['givenName']},
You are owner of the application @{items('Foreach_-_apps')?['displayName']}.
One of the secrets of this application is going to expire in @{variables('daysTilExpiration')} days.
Please take action to avoid any authentication issues related to the expiration of the secret.

Here are the details of the secret :
Secret Id : @{items('For_each_-_PasswordCred')?['keyId']}
Expiration time : @{formatDateTime(items('For_each_-_PasswordCred')?['endDateTime'],'g')}
App Id : @{items('Foreach_-_apps')?['appId']}

Thank you

body.Subject: Secrets are going to expire soon | @{items('Foreach_-_apps')?['displayName']}
